style_property.title: Base animation speed
style_property.description: All animations within the system base their speed on this value. Smaller values (in seconds) make for faster animations

style_property.title: Avatar background color
style_property.description: The basic background of all avatars, graphical and generic

style_property.title: Avatar border radius
style_property.description: Controls the size of the rounded corners on avatars - a sufficiently large value will make avatars circular

style_property.title: Default avatar image URL
style_property.description: The image URL specified here will be used as the image within the default avatar. Only applies if the "Image" type is selected above.

style_property.title: Default avatar text
style_property.description: The character(s) specified here will be used as the text within the default avatar. Only applies if the "Text" type is selected above.

style_property.title: Default avatar type
style_property.description: Controls whether the default avatar is text or image based. Unless disabled in the options, default avatars will be dynamically generated based on the user's name.

style_property.title: Dynamic avatar font
style_property.description: For letter-based avatars, this is the font employed for the text

style_property.title: Dynamic avatar base line height
style_property.description: Use this to help vertically center a dynamic avatar character when changing the font. This will be scaled based on the font size percentage.

style_property.title: Dynamic avatar text size (%)
style_property.description: Using a value between 0 and 100, this represents the approximate height of a dynamic avatar text character as a percentage of avatar.

style_property.title: Badge
style_property.description: Badges appear to indicate a number if items requiring attention, such as unread messages in your inbox

style_property.title: Badge - highlighted
style_property.description: Highlighted badges grab the viewer's attention more and tend to indicate new items to be reviewed

style_property.title: BB code blocks
style_property.description: All BB code blocks within messages make use of these styling rules

style_property.title: Maximum expandable BB code block height
style_property.description: When a large quote is posted in a message, it will expand to this height before a link to expand the block further will appear

style_property.title: BB code blocks - title
style_property.description: Styles the title section of BB code blocks within messages

style_property.title: Floated image side and bottom margin
style_property.description: This margin is used for the image side facing any wrapped text, and the bottom of the image

style_property.title: BB Code Image - Large Max Width
style_property.description: Enter a maximum width in pixels for BB code images defined as 'large'

style_property.title: BB Code Image - Medium Max Width
BB Code Image - Small Max Width
BB code block - inline code
style_property.description: Special styling rules for inline code ([ICODE]) elements.

style_property.title: Block border framework
style_property.description: Virtually all blocks have their borders styled with these settings

style_property.title: Block border radius
style_property.description: Controls the size of the curve on block border corners

style_property.title: Block filter bar
style_property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

style_property.title: Block footer
style_property.description: When information needs to be conveyed in a footer element for a block, its style is controlled here

style_property.title: Block header
style_property.description: Blocks often have title bars at their tops, which are styled here

style_property.title: Block link
style_property.description: Some links are displayed as small blocks such as choices in a popup menu, and their background will highlight when hovered

style_property.title: Block link - selected
style_property.description: Styling for block-type links when in their selected state

style_property.title: Block minor header
style_property.description: Sub-headings in blocks use these settings

style_property.title: Block minor tab header
style_property.description: Used for multi-part, tabbed sub-headings

style_property.title: Block minor tab header - selected tab
style_property.description: Selected tabs from block sub-headings

style_property.title: Block padding horizontal
style_property.description: The horizontal space between the edges of a block and its content

style_property.title: Block padding vertical
style_property.description: The vertical space between a block's content and its edges

style_property.title: Block tab header
style_property.description: Occasionally, blocks will have multi-part, tab headers, styled with these settings

style_property.title: Block tab header - selected tab
style_property.description: The selected tab in multi-part headers takes additional styling from here

style_property.title: Block text header
style_property.description: Text headers are used for subtle identification of content areas, without changing the background style or color

style_property.title: Border color
style_property.description: Structural borders around blocks of content generally use this color

style_property.title: Button base
style_property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

style_property.title: Button - call to action
style_property.description: Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread

style_property.title: Button - default
style_property.description: Most buttons use this styling, except for primary form submit buttons

style_property.title: Button - disabled
style_property.description: When buttons are disabled and unclickable, they use these styling rules

style_property.title: Button - primary
style_property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

style_property.title: Chips
style_property.description: The primary use for chips is in tagging content, where each tag will appear as a chip

style_property.title: Chips - hovered
style_property.description: Chip styling is adjusted using these settings when they are hovered

style_property.title: Accented content area base
style_property.description: When attention needs to be directed to content, this background may be employed

style_property.title: Accented content background color
style_property.description: This background color is used for further differentiation from regular content

style_property.title: Accented content area links
style_property.description: Links within accented content will be styled with these settings

style_property.title: Alternate content area base
style_property.description: When an alternative background needs to be presented along side the main content background, this will be employed

style_property.title: Alternate content background color
style_property.description: In order to differentiate it, some content will be presented on this alternative background

style_property.title: Content area base
style_property.description: This styling is applied to the background of primary content, such as messages

style_property.title: Content background color
style_property.description: Most normal content will sit on this background

style_property.title: Highlighted content area base
style_property.description: If an area of content is selected, for example a row in a table, its normal background will be substituted with this

style_property.title: Highlighted content background color
style_property.description: When the standard background color is highlighted or selected, it will use this color

style_property.title: Data list footer
style_property.description: When data lists have a terminating element at their foot, it is styled here

style_property.title: Data list header
style_property.description: The title bar of a data list is styled with these settings

style_property.title: Data list padding horizontal
style_property.description: Each row in a data list has this much horizontal padding

style_property.title: Data list padding vertical
style_property.description: Data list rows each have this much vertical padding

style_property.title: Data list section header
style_property.description: Individual data list sections are divided with this titular header bar

style_property.title: Editor background
style_property.description: The background for the editor before it is activated

style_property.title: Editor button active color
style_property.description: Color for icons when active, such as the 'B' when the cursor is on bold text

style_property.title: Editor button icon color
style_property.description: Color of the icons in the toolbar

style_property.title: Editor button icon disabled color
style_property.description: Color for icons that are disabled or unavailable

style_property.title: Editor button hover background
style_property.description: Color for button background when hovered

style_property.title: Editor button icon hover color
style_property.description: Color for button icons when hovered

style_property.title: Editor button selected background
style_property.description: Color for button background when pressed and held, or when a sub-menu is active

style_property.title: Editor button size
style_property.description: The font size for the editor button icons

style_property.title: Editor text color
style_property.description: Color for otherwise un-styled text within the editor

style_property.title: Editor background when focused
style_property.description: Background color for the editor when activated

style_property.title: Editor text when focused
style_property.description: Color for otherwise un-styled text within the activated editor

style_property.title: Editor image border and handles
style_property.description: Color of the border and resize handles for images selected in the editor

style_property.title: Editor selection background
style_property.description: Background color for text that has been selected in the editor

style_property.title: Editor selection text color
style_property.description: When text is selected within the text editor, it will use this color

style_property.title: Editor toolbar background
style_property.description: Background for the toolbar when the editor is not focused

style_property.title: Editor toolbar background when focused
style_property.description: The background of the toolbar when the editor is focused

style_property.title: Editor toolbar overflow background
style_property.description: Used for the supplemental toolbars that contain overflowed buttons from the main toolbar, and for the header of popup tool windows

style_property.title: Element spacer
style_property.description: This represents the base value for spacing between elements, such as individual blocks.

style_property.title: Email background color
style_property.description: Emails sent in HTML format will have this as its background color

style_property.title: Email border color
style_property.description: Defines the color used as a border within the email content area

style_property.title: Email alternate content background color
style_property.description: Defines the alternate color that email content may be displayed on

style_property.title: Email content background color
style_property.description: Defines the color that the main content of the email will be displayed on

style_property.title: Email font
style_property.description: Defines the font (or font list) used for text in HTML emails

style_property.title: Email header text color
style_property.description: Defines the color of text in the header bar in HTML email

style_property.title: Email link color
style_property.description: Defines the default link color in HTML emails

style_property.title: Email logo URL
style_property.description: Defines the logo URL to be used in emails. We do not recommend specifying SVG images here.

style_property.title: Email text color
style_property.description: Defines the color of the body text of HTML emails

style_property.title: Email muted text color
style_property.description: Defines how muted text will be displayed in emails. This may be used for minor text in the email body and for email footer text

style_property.title: Find threads navigation style
style_property.description: This controls how the navigation is displayed in the Find threads section.

style_property.title: Fixed system message bar
style_property.description: Occasionally, system messages will be displayed to the visitor in a fixed element that appears at the bottom of the window. Its styling is controlled here

style_property.title: Flash message bar
style_property.description: A message may temporarily appear at the top of the screen to indicate the result of an action taken. Its styling can be controlled here.

style_property.title: Body Text Font
style_property.description: This font is used for the text of messages etc.
style_property.value: "'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif"

style_property.title: Code Font
style_property.description: The font list used for mono-spaced text input and output
style_property.value: "Monaco, Menlo, Consolas, 'Roboto Mono', 'Andale Mono', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace"

style_property.title: User Interface Font
style_property.description: The font list for your main text
style_property.value: "'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', sans-serif"

style_property.title: Form element explanation text
style_property.description: Additional information about form controls may sometimes be found immediately below the control being explained

style_property.title: Form element hint text
style_property.description: Within the label column, some controls may require an additional hint to define their role

style_property.title: Form label column
style_property.description: In full-width forms, the left column contains labels for the controls in the right column

style_property.title: Form label column width
style_property.description: This should be expressed as a percentage.

style_property.title: Form row responsive break point
style_property.description: When the viewport width is below this value, the two-column layout will collapse into a single column version

style_property.title: Form row horizontal padding (inner)
style_property.description: This horizontal padding is applied to the touching edges of the label and controls columns

style_property.title: Form row horizontal padding (outer)
style_property.description: This padding is applied to the outer edges of the form content

style_property.title: Form row vertical padding
style_property.description: Each form row has this padding above and below its content

style_property.title: Form section header
style_property.description: Occasionally, forms are long enough to warrant being divided into sections, with each section headed by an element using these style rules

style_property.title: Form submit row
style_property.description: At the bottom of most forms is a bar containing the submit button etc.

style_property.title: Enable sticky form submit rows
style_property.description: If selected, longer forms may attach their submit rows to the bottom of the window when they wouldn't otherwise be visible.

style_property.title: Global action indicator color
style_property.description: This is the base color of the gadgets that display when an action is being processed in the background.

style_property.title: Inline moderation bar
style_property.description: A bar containing controls appears when content is selected for inline moderation. Its appearance is controlled here

style_property.title: Inline moderation highlight color
style_property.description: When content is selected for inline moderation, its background color will be replaced with this

style_property.title: Form input
style_property.description: Controls the style of most text-input boxes

style_property.title: Form input - disabled
style_property.description: When text boxes are disabled, these rules are applied

style_property.title: Form input - focused
style_property.description: These rules are applied to text boxes when they are selected for input

style_property.title: Line height
style_property.description: This value controls the amount of spacing between lines of text

style_property.title: Links
style_property.description: These are the styling rules for basic hyperlinks throughout the system

style_property.title: Link color
style_property.description: Basic hyperlinks on standard background colors will use this style

style_property.title: Links - hovered
style_property.description: When basic links are hovered, they use this set of rules for their styling

style_property.title: Link hover color
style_property.description: Basic hyperlinks will turn this color when hovered

style_property.title: Member profile header
style_property.description: The member profile page's content header is styled with these settings

style_property.title: Member profile header - blurb container (with banner)
Member profile header - name
style_property.description: The styling of the name of the member whose page is being viewed is controlled here

style_property.title: Member profile header - name (with banner)
style_property.description: Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed if the user has uploaded a profile banner

style_property.title: Member tooltip header - blurb container (with banner)
Member tooltip header
style_property.description: The member tooltip, which appears when hovering over user names, is styled with these controls

style_property.title: Member tooltip header - name
style_property.description: Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed

style_property.title: Member tooltip header - name (with banner)
style_property.description: Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed if the user has uploaded a profile banner

style_property.title: Menu
style_property.description: Controls the main block of all popup menus

style_property.title: Menu border radius
style_property.description: Controls the size of the border radius for all menus

style_property.title: Menu feature border color
style_property.description: Popup menus have a thick feature border on their upper edge, the styling of which is controlled here

style_property.title: Menu footer
style_property.description: When a popup menu has a bottom, footer element, it will use these settings

style_property.title: Menu header
style_property.description: Most menus identify themselves with a header just underneath their top border

style_property.title: Menu link row
style_property.description: Styling for link rows within popup menus

style_property.title: Menu link row - selected
style_property.description: Styling for link rows in menus, when selected or hovered

style_property.title: Menu tab header
style_property.description: Multi-part, tabbed menu headers use these settings

style_property.title: Menu tab header - selected tab
style_property.description: Controls the selected tab in multi-part menu headers

style_property.title: New message indicator
style_property.description: Usually a small token attached to the message block, the indicator that a message is new/unread is controlled here

style_property.title: Message padding
style_property.description: When using the full size message block, this value defines the size of the padding around the message text

style_property.title: Message padding small
style_property.description: This value controls the padding around the message text when using the small message block

style_property.title: Message signature
style_property.description: Any rules used to apply styling to users' signatures in their messages are defined here

style_property.title: Message single column break point
style_property.description: When the viewport is smaller than this value, the user column will collapse, leaving a single-column message layout

style_property.title: Message user info block
style_property.description: Apart from its width, the (left) message user info column is styled here

style_property.title: Message user info block width
style_property.description: Controls the width of the (left) user info column on the full size message block

style_property.title: Message user info elements
style_property.description: The elements selected here will be displayed in the message user info block. It will not be displayed below the single column width.

style_property.title: Meta theme color
style_property.description: This sets the theme color used for PWA installations, as well as the address bar color on Chrome for Android.

style_property.title: Minor internal block content
style_property.description: Content within blocks that is of less importance than the main content may be styled here

style_property.title: Read node icon color
style_property.description: When the content within a node has been read, its icon will revert to a less attention-grabbing color, defined here

style_property.title: Unread node icon color
style_property.description: Node icons give an at-a-glance indication of whether or not the content housed within the node has been read. The unread icon color should stand out from its background for quick identification

style_property.title: Description display style
style_property.description: To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip

style_property.title: Sub-forums display style
style_property.description: Choose the style in which sub-forums will be displayed within a particular node element, according to the amount of space you want them to occupy

style_property.title: Scrollable notice interval
style_property.description: Each scrollable notice will be displayed for this amount of time before the next is displayed. Hovering or interacting with the notices will prevent auto scrolling.

style_property.title: Overlay header
style_property.description: Overlays use a header element to identify their contents, styled here

style_property.title: Overlay mask blur amount
style_property.description: When an overlay is displayed, the page content will be blurred by the amount specified here. This can help draw focus to the overlay content.

style_property.title: Overlay mask color
style_property.description: When an overlay is shown, the page behind is masked by the color defined here. Use RGBA transparency to allow the page to show through

style_property.title: Overlay top margin
style_property.description: This defines the distance between the top of the viewport and the top of the overlay

style_property.title: Page background
style_property.description: The page background, behind all block elements, uses the styling rules defined here

style_property.title: Page background color
style_property.description: The background of the page itself, on which all other content rests

style_property.title: Page edge spacer
style_property.description: All elements will be spaced at least this far from the edges of the page

style_property.title: Page navigation style
style_property.description: This controls the appearance of page navigation. "Simple" focuses on the current page and is good for touch devices. "Standard" shows relative page numbers and is good for desktops. "Mixed" switches between them based on device size.

style_property.title: Maximum page width
style_property.description: As the window is resized, it will continue to grow in width until this value, after which it will remain static

style_property.title: Enable profile post comment input toggle
style_property.description: If enabled, the input for a profile post comment will only be displayed after the toggle is clicked.

style_property.title: Progress bar color
style_property.description: The progress bar appears at the top of the window when the system is waiting for a response from the server

style_property.title: Favicon URL (32x32)
style_property.description: Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site. This is expected to be a 32x32 PNG image.

style_property.title: Footer
style_property.description: The footer is the primary element that sits below the main content on all public pages

style_property.title: Footer links
style_property.description: Controls styling for individual links within the footer

style_property.title: Header/logo row
style_property.description: The header row contains your logo and sits at the top of every public page

style_property.title: Header adjustment color
style_property.description: The color of the header background is adjusted to be used as the background for the inbox and alerts area in the header

style_property.title: Icon URL (192x192)
style_property.description: The path to your icon image. This should be a 192x192 image and usually a PNG.

style_property.title: Icon URL (512x512)
style_property.description: The path to your large icon image. This should be a 512x512 image and usually a PNG.

style_property.title: Icons are maskable
style_property.description: If enabled, you are indicating that the icons above respect the minimum safe zone and can be cropped to the appropriate icon size for various devices.

style_property.title: Public logo height
style_property.description: If you specify the height of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.

style_property.title: Logo URL
style_property.description: The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image. If you specify an SVG image here, you should set Emails > Email logo URL to point to a PNG image, or similar, for increased compatibility.

style_property.title: 2x logo URL
style_property.description: The path to a double-resolution / retina version of your logo image

style_property.title: Public logo width
style_property.description: If you specify the width of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.

style_property.title: Metadata logo URL
style_property.description: Path to the metadata / OpenGraph logo used by your site on social media

style_property.title: Navigation row
style_property.description: The navigation row sits below the header and contains the primary site navigation tabs and menus

style_property.title: Navigation collapse width
style_property.description: Below this page width, the navigation system will collapse down into an off canvas menu

style_property.title: Navigation padding horizontal
style_property.description: Defines the amount of padding applied horizontally to each main navigational tab in the header

style_property.title: Navigation padding vertical
style_property.description: This value defines the amount of padding applied to the main navigational tabs in the header

style_property.title: Navigation row - selected tab
style_property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when they are selected

style_property.title: Sticky navigation element
style_property.description: If you intend for some or all of your header to stick to the top of the page when it is scrolled, choose which elements should stick

style_property.title: Navigation row - tab
style_property.description: Controls the styling of individual tab elements within the navigation row

style_property.title: Navigation row - hovered tab
style_property.description: Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

style_property.title: Navigation row - menu open
style_property.description: Styling applied when the popup menu for the current tab is visible

style_property.title: Push notification badge URL
style_property.description: If you provide the URL to a single color/alpha channel logo/icon here, this will be used in place of the browser's default icon.

style_property.title: Staff tools bar
style_property.description: Visible only to staff, the staff tools bar sits above the header and contains items such as reported content, the moderation queue...

style_property.title: Sub-navigation row
style_property.description: Below the main navigation row, this row shows content associated with the selected main navigation tab

style_property.title: Sub-navigation row - hovered element
style_property.description: Additional styling applied to sub-navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

style_property.title: Sub-navigation row - menu-open element
style_property.description: Styles sub-navigation elements whose popup menu is currently open

style_property.title: Sub-navigation padding horizontal
style_property.description: The amount of horizontal padding for each sub-navigation element

style_property.title: Sub-navigation padding vertical
style_property.description: Defines the amount of vertical padding applied to each item in the sub-navigation bar in the header

style_property.title: Show reaction summary on lists
style_property.description: If enabled, the top three reactions received will be displayed on the list pages (such as thread lists).

style_property.title: Page edge spacer removal break point
style_property.description: When the page is narrower than this value, the spacers at the edge of the page are discarded

style_property.title: Medium responsive break point
style_property.description: Medium width styling rules are used below this page width value

style_property.title: Narrow responsive break point
style_property.description: The page is considered 'narrow' if its width is less than this value

style_property.title: Wide responsive break point
style_property.description: The page will use the 'wide' styling rules if its width is below this value, and the 'full' rules if the width exceeds it

style_property.title: Display page jump buttons on scroll
style_property.description: If enabled, floating buttons will be displayed shortly after the page is scrolled which allow you to jump to the top or bottom of the page. If this is only triggered when scrolling up, only a jump to top button will be displayed.

style_property.title: Sidebar and side navigation spacer
style_property.description: Distance between the main content and the sidebar

style_property.title: Sidebar and side navigation width
style_property.description: Width of any elements that make up the sidebar

style_property.title: Standalone tabs
style_property.description: Tabs that are not part of block headers are styled here

style_property.title: Standalone tabs - selected tab
style_property.description: The selected tab in groups that are not part of block headers

style_property.title: Empty rating star color
style_property.description: This is the color of the empty portion of each rating star.

style_property.title: Full rating star color
style_property.description: This is the color of the full portion of each rating star.

style_property.title: Style type
style_property.description: This defines the general type of style in use based on whether the content is placed on a light or dark background. This may change how colors are selected in certain scenarios.

style_property.title: Text color
style_property.description: Unless otherwise specified, text will be this color

style_property.title: Dimmed text color
style_property.description: Used when less-important text is placed next to normal text

style_property.title: Muted text color
style_property.description: Text is further de-emphasised using this style

style_property.title: Tooltip
style_property.description: Certain elements have special floating tooltips, which are controlled here

style_property.title: What's new navigation style
style_property.description: This controls how the navigation is displayed in the What's new section. Side navigation works better with more sections but requires more space.

style_property.title: Z-index multiplier
style_property.description: Controls the relative 'height' of elements in the Z-dimension (perpendicular to the screen). Unless you have a specific reason to change this, leave it alone...
